alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 3:50PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lawrence, northwestern Mingo, southwestern Lincoln and central Wayne Counties through 415 PM EST... At 350 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Milo, or 7 miles northwest of Inez, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Louisa, Blaine, Yatesville Lake State Park, Fort Gay, Ulysses, East Lynn Lake, Charley, Kiahsville, Dunlow, Martha, Hode, Keaton, Kermit, Gallup, Crum, Clifford, Glenhayes, Houckville, Wilsondale and Fallsburg. TIME...MOT...LOC 2050Z 208DEG 100KT 3797 8260 MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for northeastern Kentucky...and central, southern and western West Virginia.
